about_the_game:
About this content

This pack offers a diverse range of single illustration assets that express Edo period drama, suitable for use in RPGs and visual novels.
It includes time variations for day, evening, night (lit), night (unlit), cloudy, and rainy scenes, making it a valuable resource for crafting adventure games!

*******************************************
Pictures: 34 (816x624, 1280x720)
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
